name: Treading
description: The Gate of the Behavior of the Self - The power of authentic self-love and behavior

channel.name: Awakening
channel.description: The Channel of Awakening - A Design of Commitment to Higher Principles

signal.trigger: Acting from should instead of authentic desire
signal.script: You're performing a role rather than being yourself. What would you do if you fully loved yourself?
experiments: Do one thing today purely because you want to
Practice saying 'I love myself' and notice resistance
Choose self-honoring behavior in one small way

friction.script: You're abandoning yourself to gain external approval. Your behavior must align with self-love. Where are you performing?
experiments: Identify one behavior that doesn't serve you and stop it
Practice disappointing others in service of self-integrity
Ask: 'Would someone who loves themselves do this?'

breakpoint.script: The self you've been trying to be is dissolving so your true self can emerge. This death is necessary for authentic rebirth.
experiments: Work with a therapist on self-compassion
Write daily: 'I am learning to love myself by...'
Practice mirror workâ€”meet your own eyes with kindness
